{{champion:34}} x http://www.iconsdb.com/icons/preview/caribbean-blue/square-xxl.png

Yes, yes, a very good ship with tons of backstory and meaning.
The aqua color, a mixture of blue and green. This represents how Anivia, a member or the Freljord has been merged and corrupted by the green depths of Zaun. Infused with hextech, Anivia is a shadow of her former self and is now a failed experiment left to rot at the bottom of Zaun. The blue square is representing Mei. Anivia and Mei both create walls, but unlike Anivia, Mei has not been corrupted by the Zaun hextech and has a much grander wall. Having a larger wall comes with a trade-off though. Mei's wall can break, unlike Anivia's, which is represented by the slight blur around the blue box.
Anivia and Mei is a perfect ship. They both fill in what the other is missing. Anivia can finally see a return to form with assistance from Mei, and Mei can delve into the new technologies in the League of Legends universe to help prevent another Omnic Crisis.
A truly beautiful work of art you have created.
